name: LET ME IN (quinn milton)
description:
LET ME IN — A larp of temptation and possession for two players. 

One of you is a Human, beaten down by your Enemy and holding secret a Dark Desire for revenge. But your Decency keeps you from enacting it. 

One of you is an Entity, here to fulfill the Dark Desire—if only the Human will Let You In.

Fill out the contract to play.

August 2019. 3 pages and Cover. Folder includes low-ink print-friendly version. 

This is a game about temptation, seduction, and possession. It can also be a game about coercion and manipulation. It can be a touch or no-touch game. If that doesn't sound like a fun, hot horror experience, consider playing a different game in the #HotHorrorJam.
